span.p:
Styled Text Only
No JavaScript execution possible

span.p:
Allowed Tags:
p, div, h1-h6, strong, b, em, i,
u, s, del, span, br, a, ul, ol, li,
blockquote, pre, bdi, bdo

http, https, mailto, tel
